Pengamat : NasDem Galau Berada di Pusaran Kekuasaan
01 Nov 2019, 11:36 by Erik Hamzah, SH


Pengamat : NasDem Galau Berada di Pusaran Kekuasaan

KBRN, Bekasi : Pengamat kebijakan publik dari Center Public Policy Studies (CPPS) Bambang Istianto mengatakan konstelasi politik perjalanan pemerintahan kabinet jilid II Presiden Jokowi mengalami sedikit gangguan, atas akrobat politik Ketua Umum Partai Nasional Demokrat (NasDem) Surya Paloh yang dinilai galau di tengah pusaran kekuasaaan.  
“Sebenarnya janggal jika NasDem yang sudah mendapat jatah dua menteri merasa belum nyaman. Merapatnya Nasdem ke PKS dalam perspektif ideologi sangat menarik, dan langkah NasDem perlu diikuti,” ungkap Bambang kepada wartawan, Jumat (01/11/2019). 
Menurutnya, NasDem dikenal sebagai partai berbasis ideologi  sosial  demokrat yang cenderung sekuler sepertinya ingin mesra dengan PKS yang berbasis ideologi islam. 
Bambang menilai, penafsiran pragmatis boleh jadi NasDem ingin mendapat simpati kalangan islam modern dan kelas menengah yang jumlahnya cukup besar. Atau menaikan bergaining dengan Presiden Jokowi setelah tergeser oleh Prabowo. 
Dalam perspektif idealism, kata Bambang, langkah NasDem akan memperkuat oposisi ditengah kepuasaan publik yang menurun terhadap performance kabinet jilid II setelah pro kontra terhadap profile beberapa menteri yang kontroversi seperti Menag dan Mendikbud dan yang lain. 
“Tentunya manuver Surya Paloh cukup menggangu konsentrasi Jokowi dalam mengawali konsolidasi pemerintahan persiapan tancap gas menggenjot ketertinggalan momentum kebangkitan ekonomi,” ucap dosen pascasarjana ini. 
Dalam konteks pengendalian kekuasaan, kata Bambang, pemerintahan oposisi perlu diperkuat supaya tidak loss kontrol. “Terutama terhadap kebijakan ekonomi dan politik dan keamanan. Kehadiran NasDem dalam barisan oposisi dapat menggiring pada posisi balance power yang yang sehat,” tutur Bambang.

Observer: NasDem upset at the vortex of power
01 Nov 2019, 11:36 by Erik Hamzah, SH


Observer: NasDem upset at the vortex of power

KBRN, Bekasi: Public policy observer from the Center for Public Policy Studies (CPPS) Bambang Istianto said the political constellation of the administration of the cabinet volume II President Jokowi experienced a slight disturbance, over political acrobatics Chair of the Democratic National Party (NasDem) Chairperson Surya Paloh who was considered to be upset in the middle of the vortex power.
"Actually it is awkward if NasDem, who has already been allocated two ministers, feels uncomfortable. Nasdem's approach to PKS from an ideological perspective is very interesting, and NasDem's steps need to be followed, "Bambang told reporters on Friday (01/11/2019).
According to him, NasDem is known as a party based on social democratic ideology which tends to be secular, seemingly intimate with PKS based on Islamic ideology.
Bambang rate, pragmatic interpretation may be NasDem wants to get the sympathy of modern Islam and the middle class who are quite large in number. Or increase training with President Jokowi after being displaced by Prabowo.
In the perspective of idealism, said Bambang, NasDem's step would be to strengthen opposition amid the declining public satisfaction of the performance of the cabinet volume II after the pros and cons of the profile of several controversial ministers such as the Minister of Religion and Minister of Education and Culture and others.
"Surely the Surya Paloh maneuver is enough to disturb Jokowi's concentration in initiating the consolidation of the government to step on the gas step to boost the lagging momentum of the economic revival," said the graduate lecturer.
In the context of controlling power, said Bambang, the opposition government needs to be strengthened so there is no loss of control. "Especially with regard to economic and political and security policies. NasDem's presence in the opposition ranks can lead to a healthy position of balance power, "said Bambang.
